name: Safer apart
description:
In this arcade game you control two characters. One can only move sideways and the other one can only move in diagonal. When doing so, each one shoots contrary to how they move. Dodge both random projectiles and your own bullets to get as much points as you can.

You can play this game by yourself for an extra challenge or with a friend(locally) for some laughs.

Made for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.
